sentences.en: He finally faltered in the last game of a heroic match.
sentences.cn: 他在这场艰苦比赛的最后一局中踉跄结束。

sentences.en: He received a medal for his heroic feat.
sentences.cn: 他因其英雄业绩而获得一枚勋章.

sentences.en: He said his advice was: "No heroics, stay within the law."
sentences.cn: 他说他的意见是：“不要有逞能行为，要依法办事。”

sentences.en: her heroic efforts to save her family
sentences.cn: 她拯救家人的英勇行为

sentences.en: Her heroic image is written on our hearts.
sentences.cn: 她的英雄形象永远铭刻在我们心中.

sentences.en: Lawrence’s heroic struggle against his destiny
sentences.cn: 劳伦斯与命运的勇敢抗争

sentences.en: Many people have heard of the man's heroic deeds.
sentences.cn: 许多人都已经听说了这个人的英雄事迹.

sentences.en: Rescuers made heroic efforts to save the crew.
sentences.cn: 救援人员不畏艰险努力营救全体船员。

sentences.en: She portrayed him as a heroic figure .
sentences.cn: 她把他描述为英雄人物。

sentences.en: The company has made heroic efforts at cost reduction.
sentences.cn: 公司在降低成本方面付出了艰苦卓绝的努力。

sentences.en: The heroic deeds of him embodied the glorious tradition of the troops.
sentences.cn: 他的英雄事迹体现了军队的光荣传统.

sentences.en: The heroic deeds of the people's soldiers are too numerous to enumerate.
sentences.cn: 人民子弟兵的事迹举不胜举.

sentences.en: The heroic image is stamped in [ on ] our memory.
sentences.cn: 这一英雄形象 铭刻 在我们心中.

sentences.en: The heroic image of Lei Feng flashed before my eyes.
sentences.cn: 雷锋的英雄形象闪现在我的眼前!

sentences.en: The two heroic sisters quickly headed off the panic - stricken sheep.
sentences.cn: 两个勇敢的小姐妹赶忙上前拦住受惊的羊群.

sentences.en: The victim put up a heroic struggle against his assailant.
sentences.cn: 那位受害者与攻击者展开了英勇的搏斗.

sentences.en: Their dogged single-mindedness is almost heroic.
sentences.cn: 他们不屈不挠专心致志的劲头简直是一种壮举。

words.tran_cn: 英勇，英雄气概；英雄行为；勇敢的事迹

trans.tran_cn: 有英雄气概的，英雄的，英勇的，记叙英雄及其事迹的，夸张的
trans.tran_en: extremely brave or determined, and admired by many people
If you describe someone's actions or plans as heroics, you think that they are foolish or dangerous because they are too difficult or brave for the situation in which they occur
